**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 470 4.0 --- You attempt to escape from being [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20), [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24), or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33). Choose one creature, object, spell effect, hazard, or other impediment imposing any of those conditions on you. Attempt a check using your unarmed attack modifier against the DC of the effect. This is typically the [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) DC of a creature grabbing you, the [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) DC of a creature who tied you up, the spell DC for a spell effect, or the listed Escape DC of an object, hazard, or other impediment. You can attempt an [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) or Athletics check instead of using your attack modifier if you choose (but this action still has the [attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15) trait). **Critical Success** You get free and remove the grabbed, immobilized, and restrained conditions imposed by your chosen target. You can then Stride up to 5 feet.
**Success** You get free and remove the grabbed, immobilized, and restrained conditions imposed by your chosen target.
**Critical Failure** You don’t get free, and you can’t attempt to Escape again until your next turn.
